name: Digital-Twin model of Sejong City
description:
Digital-Twin model of Sejong City – Source model code & data

We only shared model codes, excluding private data and simulation engine codes. 
The followings are brief reasons for the items we cannot share.

1.	Residence address data

We have received this anonymized data from Sejong City Hall with permission, and we are under the supervision of the authorities. However, we do not have the right to disclose this data to the public. 

2.	Simulation engine codes

Because we perform full-scale city simulation of our model, there is a limit to implementing it in existing public simulation engines. Therefore, we implement the model using a simulation engine capable of distributed parallel computation. This engine is currently under development by Korea's Electronics and Telecommunications Research Institute, and we do not have the right to disclose it.
releaseNotes: First release version of Digital-Twin model of Sejong City
